1.1.name: wordpress/wp-imagemation
1.1.description:
Gives a video effect to the pictures. Show a set of sliding images which interacts with your mouse movement on your wordpress pages/posts . You can specify the window size and the big image will slide with in that window rectangle. Add up to 10 images of any dimensions for animation.
Captions can also be specified for each image . The image can be moved to any four directions with the movement of the mouse. if the mouse is moved in north-east direction , the image also starts moving in the same direction. Animation pauses with Mouseover and starts again with Mouseout.

Important Links:

  • Demo & Easy Setup Guide
  • Got Issues/Questions ? Get Answered Here at The Support Forum

Features:

  • Display big images in a small window
  • Gives video effect to an image
  • Image interact wit
